body_html: I am having the same issue on CentOs 6.7. Now I am using Bazel version 0.3.0 to compile tensorflow 0.9.0. How to make bazel recognize LD_LIBRARY_PATH is the question. #110 includes step-wise directions including a couple of hacks but does not work for me. Still getting the libpython not found error.
